channel.title: My server is messed up
channel.description: my server needs help... when i tried to attack something the connection dissconects and it wont ever let me attack any npc.. and how do you make your own npc and customize the drop? any help?

item.title: My server is messed up

ok say i want my friends to try my server as a trial to see what needs to be fixed and whats need to be edited more… is there a way i could let them test out my client without giving them the oppurtunity to edit the server/client or use it as there server/client?

Tyb Hyperion is a terrible base for someone who doesn’t even know how to change the starting location in PI… You’re setting him up to fail. I only know 1 good hyperion source which is PJA and even that is terribly bugged. PI is a better starting source for him, Army123 i’d suggest looking in the server tutorials section to learn the basics about PI.

item.title: My server is messed up
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:22, topic:423106”]^That has been an argument I have been noticing for a long time, it is a biased topic so you will get different answers, but using delta or PI, is just typing in methods, and getting them to work, (At least that’s what most people do) only the average programmers and above that skill level can actually do real work with them, but a Hyperion is a great way to get started I feel, as PI is over used, and leeched a bunch, and you can learn a lot from Hyperion.[/quote]ok well thanks for a rather short discussion and its alright if u think that hyperion is a good way for beginner programming to start out because they are being brought into an environment specifically made for speed and efficiency by a well-known and good programmer. i just wanted to know why

Read full topic

item.title: My server is messed up
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

^That has been an argument I have been noticing for a long time, it is a biased topic so you will get different answers, but using delta or PI, is just typing in methods, and getting them to work, (At least that’s what most people do) only the average programmers and above that skill level can actually do real work with them, but a Hyperion is a great way to get started I feel, as PI is over used, and leeched a bunch, and you can learn a lot from Hyperion.

Read full topic
